articles.title: Congratulations to President of Finland
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Finland
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Sauli Niinisto upon his re-election as president of the Republic of Finland.
					 Kim in the message wished the Finnish president bigger success in his responsible work for the country's prosperity, expressing the belief that bilateral ties would develop on good terms in common interests.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Meets European Politicians
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Meets European Politicians
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Ri Su Yong, chairman of the Foreign Affairs Committee of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is member of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Wednesday had a talk with the visiting delegation of politicians from various political parties in Europe led by Jonathan Powell of the British Labor Party, former Downing Street Chief of Staff to Prime Minister Tony Blair.
					 Ri Su Yong said that the Party and people are launching a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all the fronts of building a powerful socialist country true to the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He informed the delegation of the situation on the Korean Peninsula in which the climate of national reconciliation, unity and detente is being created thanks to the DPRK's proactive measure and sincere efforts.
					
					 Jonathan Powell welcomed the recent phase of detente on the Korean Peninsula thanks to the DPRK's proactive proposal, hoping that such trend will be kept. 
					
					 Members of the delegation acknowledged that development of the relations between the DPRK and Europe is a contribution to interests of both sides and peace and stability of the world, expressing their will to continue dialogue between the Workers' Party of Korea and various political parties and politicians of Europe in the future, too.

articles.title: New Posters Produced
articles.content:
New Posters Produced
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- New posters were produced in the DPRK to encourage the army and people to the struggle for carrying out the tasks set forth in the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 The poster reading "Long Live the 70th Founding Anniversary of the DPRK!" reflects the great joy and excitement of the Korean army and people who will mark the 70th birthday of the DPRK with splendor.
					
					 Some posters call for turning out in the struggle to frustrate the last-ditch challenges of the hostile forces and put the overall national power of the DPRK on a new stage of development by launching an all-people general offensive under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 There are also posters calling for strengthening the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Some posters show the Korean army and people's will to accelerate the major construction projects and reach the high peak of a sci-tech power and highly civilized power.

articles.title: New Stamps Issued
articles.content:
New Stamps Issued
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The DPRK State Stamp Bureau issued new stamps (two sheets and four sheetlets) dealing with the New Year Address of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 Seen in upper parts of the sheets are letters "Let us launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory on all fronts of building a powerful socialist country!"
					
					 One of the sheets carries a photo of Kim Jong Un making his New Year Address for Juche 107 (2018). Printed in its lower part are letters reading "Single-minded unity".
					
					 The sheetlets reflect the ideas on consolidating the independence and Juche character of the national economy, improving the people's standard of living, developing the socialist culture in an overall way and further increasing the military capabilities for self-defense.

articles.title: Football Schools to Be Established
articles.content:
Football Schools to Be Established
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Football schools are to be established in Pyongyang and each province (municipality) of the DPRK.
					 According to Jang Chol Jun, department director of the DPRK Football Association, it aims to bring up more reserve footballers helpful to the development of football technique in the country.
					
					 The schools will offer two-year primary, three-year junior and three-year secondary courses which put the main stress on the education in basic subjects and theory on football and training of practical skills.
					
					 Pyongyang City and each province (municipality) are paying deep attention to ensuring good educational condition and circumstances for the schools.
					
					 The football schools will open on April 1.

articles.title: Koreans in Japan Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Koreans in Japan Pay Floral Tribute to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- An art troupe of Koreans in Japan headed by Ha Yong Su for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill here Wednesday.
					 Members of the art troupe laid a bouquet before the statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Big Efforts Paid to Education in DPRK
articles.content:
Big Efforts Paid to Education in DPRK
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Education Commission strives to improve the qualifications of teachers and the contents and methods of education as required by the developing reality, as part of their efforts to implement the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 It has taken such measures as organizing reeducation and training courses to improve the qualifications of teachers at universities and other schools.
					
					 Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and other universities have pushed ahead with producing many more world-level competent scholars and encouraging teachers and researchers to take active part in international seminars.
					
					 And due measures have been taken to improve the quality of education for postgraduate courses at different universities in local areas and teacher-training colleges pay deep attention to put distance education on a higher stage.
					
					 It gains momentum to create a model in improving contents and methods of education and generalize them at Moranbong Secondary School No. 1 and other schools and achievements have been made in preparing teaching programs for primary and general secondary schools.
					
					 Preparations have been made to successfully enforce the simultaneous graduation examination at senior middle schools in tens of cities and counties across the country.
					
					 The Education Commission also strives to set up more technical senior middle schools and inspires universities to play the role as the center of scientific studies, information, database and tele-education in their localities, while paying big efforts to establish a regular system of academic integration. 
					
					 Meanwhile, it progresses apace to increase the number of subjects at tele-education colleges and improve the educational condition and environment.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Reveals What Happened behind Dialogue
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Reveals What Happened behind Dialogue
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- There are signs of unwanted moves of confrontation going against the warming situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Shortly ago, the U.S. and the south Korean authorities held the second high-level meeting of the diplomatic and defense council for carrying out the extended deterrent strategy in Washington to discuss such issues as expanding rotation deployment of the U.S. strategic assets in and around south Korea and maintaining the "system of cooperation in the smear campaign against the north."
					
					 Recently the U.S. has sent towards the Korean Peninsula its nuclear strategic bombers and nuclear aircraft carrier strike groups one after another and accelerated preparations for secret special operations to be ready for contingency, bringing the danger into relief.
					
					 We have already laid bare the sinister intention of the U.S. blocking the harmony of our nation and trying to aggravate the situation while paying lip-service to "support" or "welcome" for the inter-Korean dialogue, and issued a series of warnings.
					
					 But, they went the length of hatching the criminal plot designed to formulate and plan military confrontation targeting the DPRK behind dialogue.
					
					 All the facts show that the U.S. sinister plot has already gone into action to block the recent developments for the improved inter-Korean relations and drive the hard-won atmosphere of regional detente into the mire of standoff and conflicts.
					
					 Now is the time for all Koreans and the international community to see through the true intention of the U.S. over dialogue and peace.
					
					 Notably, the south Korean authorities should come to their senses.
					
					 It is not good deed to hatch a plot for military confrontation with the U.S. against the fellow countrymen after having a dialogue with the DPRK.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday that massive deployment of nuclear strike means of the U.S. imperialist aggression forces in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity will add to the danger of nuclear war and create a phase of extreme tension rather than regional peace.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities fail to see through the true intention of the U.S. to bind south Korea to "consultative council", "alliance" and others and use it as a war servant, a sacrifice of nuclear war, and continue to play into its hands, they will face self-destruction. They should be aware that such action will put out the valuable spark for the improved inter-Korean relations and lead them to ruin.
					
					 Dialogue can never go with confrontation.
					
					 All the fellow countrymen at home and abroad should resolutely oppose and reject military nexus of the U.S. and the south Korean authorities against the climate favorable for the inter-Korean reconciliation.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Working and Living in Militant Way
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Working and Living in Militant Way
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- It presents itself as a more urgent requirement to establish a revolutionary habit of working and living in a militant way in the fiercer struggle for realizing independence of the popular masses, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article, and goes on:
					 For all the people to live and struggle in a revolutionary and militant way is essential for reliably defending the socialist country and the gains of the revolution.
					
					 The objective sought by the imperialists for aggression is to disintegrate the people of the targeted nation ideologically by introducing their corrupt ideology and culture and persistently pursue sanctions and pressure to lead them to hardships in living and unrest. This is the method of the imperialists to achieve their purpose of aggression and plunder with ease by neutralizing the strength of the targeted country and it is also a curtain raiser to a war of aggression.
					
					 The security of the country and the people is not guaranteed by the modern arms and equipment.
					
					 Only when all our service personnel and people heighten the revolutionary vigilance and are fully ready for action, can the might of our powerful war deterrent, the treasured sword of defending the peace, be given full rein.
					
					 The socialist country will be further strengthened into an impregnable fortress only when all the people live and struggle in a revolutionary and militant way, remaining alert and prepared at all times with transparent class consciousness.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on True Intention of Evacuation Drills in U.S., Japan
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on True Intention of Evacuation Drills in U.S., Japan 
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- Days ago, a false warning that "ballistic missile is coming from the DPRK" was sounded in Hawaii of the U.S. to demand an immediate evacuation, plunging the whole island into appalling confusion. And the U.S. media reported that inhabitants of Michigan of the U.S. took the explosion of a meteorite for a missile attack, being stupefied with terror, which added to uneasiness.
					 Meanwhile, the Japanese reactionaries waged a large-scale evacuation drill under the stimulated missile attack by someone in downtown Tokyo. Earlier, the NHK of Japan posted on the internet a message of the government to recommend taking shelter in a building or underground over the missile presumed to be fired by the DPRK, striking the citizens with horror.
					
					 In this regard, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary lays bare the true intention sought by the U.S. and the Japanese reactionaries in advertising "missile threats" and kicking up a row of evacuations as never before.
					
					 First of all, they attempt to build up public opinion against the DPRK in the international community as well as at home by purposely setting afloat the horror of the DPRK's nukes and rockets through those anti-missile evacuations, says the commentary, adding:
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the anti-missile evacuation rows in the U.S. and Japan were neither regular ones nor ones by misinformation but premeditated moves to examine war preparations any time under war scenario targeting the DPRK.
					
					 Their anti-missile evacuations are clearly aimed at igniting a war of aggression against the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. and Anti-reunification Forces Slammed in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. and Anti-reunification Forces Slammed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The Ryongsan Regional Committee of the People's Party of south Korea issued a statement on Jan. 25 to denounce the U.S. and other anti-reunification forces for blocking peace on the Korean Peninsula, according to the south Korean online paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The statement condemned the U.S. and the anti-reunification forces toeing its line for persistently preventing the improvement of the south-north relations.
					
					 It charged that the U.S. is coiling up the military tension by intensifying the moves to introduce special operation units and strategic weapons into the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity.

articles.title: Meeting of Chapter Chairpersons of Chongryon Held in Tokyo
articles.content:
Meeting of Chapter Chairpersons of Chongryon Held in Tokyo
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A meeting of chapter chairpersons of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) took place at the Korean Hall in Tokyo on Jan. 26 to glorify this year as a year of great advance that makes a decisive breakthrough in the development of the movement of Koreans in Japan, in hearty response to respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and New Year message and concentrate all efforts on the chapter work of Chongryon.
					 Present there were Chairman Ho Jong Man and vice-chairpersons of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, and chairpersons of the Chongryon headquarters and chapters across Japan and officials of the Chongryon headquarters in Kanto.
					
					 Ho Jong Man said in his report that the officials of Chongryon should stage an all-out organized movement for the 24th Chongryon Congress with main stress put on the chapter work.
					
					 The chapter chairpersons of Chongryon should cherish deep in their mind the main ideas contained in Kim Jong Un's New Year Address and New Year message and carry them into practice without condition, he said.
					
					 Noting that the respected Supreme Leader set it as the general orientation of Chongryon's struggle for this year to make a decisive breakthrough in the work for developing the movement of Koreans in Japan into a higher stage with the 24th Chongryon Congress as an occasion, the reporter stressed that all the Chongryon officials should turn out as one to carry out this task.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers expressed their resolution to thoroughly establish the unified leadership system of Kim Jong Un, enhance the function and role of the chapter standing committees, strengthen the organizations as firm as a rock and thus reap actual results in carrying out the patriotic tasks, in hearty response to his New Year Address and New Year message.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Organization of DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Organization of DR Congo
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo posted on its website the full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Creating a Social Climate in Which Prominence Is Given to Military Affairs" on Jan. 17 on the threshold of the 70th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army.
					 The work, published on Feb. 4, Juche 81 (1992), deals with the issue of holding a large-scale military parade to celebrate the 60th birthday of the Korean People's Army in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for strengthening the KPA and creating a social climate in which priority is given to military affairs.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Sweden
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Sweden
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A Swedish preparatory committee for celebrating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Stockholm on Jan. 19.
					 Christer Lundgren, chairman of the Sweden-Korea Friendship Association, and Oskar Molleby, chief of the Swedish Group for the Study of the Juche Idea, were elected co-chairmen of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold colorful political and cultural events in praise of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Pakistan
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Pakistan
 Pyongyang, January 31 (KCNA) -- A Pakistani national preparatory committee for celebrating leader Kim Jong Il's birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star) was formed in Karachi on Jan. 19.
					 K.U. Rehman, senator of Pakistan, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural functions in praise of Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam desea exitos en el trabajo del presidente finlandes
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam desea exitos en el trabajo del presidente finlandes
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 30 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de la Republica de Finlandia, Sauli Niinisto. 
					Convencido de que las relaciones entre dos paises se desarrollaran favorablemente conforme a los intereses comunes, el remitente deseo mayores exitos en las responsabilidades del destinatario por la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion de politicos de partidos europeos
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong se reune con delegacion de politicos de partidos europeos
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Ri Su Yong, miembro del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente de la Comision de Relaciones Exteriores de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, departio el dia 31 con la delegacion de los politicos de partidos europeos, encabezada por Jonathan Powell del Partido Laborista Britanico quien fue jefe de Downing Street del Estado Mayor del Primer Ministro Tony Blair. 
					Ri Su Yong senalo que en acato al Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, el partido y pueblo coreanos libran una ofensiva general revolucionaria para alcanzar la nueva victoria en todos los frentes de la construccion de una potencia socialista. 
					
					E informo la situacion creada en la Peninsula Coreana en que ambas partes coreanas se empenan por la reconciliacion y la unidad de la nacion y el alivio de la tension, gracias a las medidas iniciativas y los esfuerzos sinceros de la RPDC.
					
					Jonathan Powell evaluo la creacion de la fase de alivio de la tension en la Peninsula Coreana gracias a la iniciativa de la RPDC y deseo que continuara tal tendencia.
					
					Reconociendo que el desarrollo de relaciones entre la RPDC y Europa contribuira a los intereses de ambas partes y a la paz y seguridad del mundo, los miembros de la delegacion expresaron la opinion de continuar en el futuro tambien las conversaciones entre el PTC y los partidos politicos y los estadistas de Europa.

articles.title: Emitidos nuevos sellos relativos al Mensaje de Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Emitidos nuevos sellos relativos al Mensaje de Ano Nuevo de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- La Direccion Estatal de Sellos de Corea emitio los sellos (2 papeles enterizos de tamano pequeno y 4 papeles enterizos) que presentan el contenido del Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					En la parte superior de los papeles enterizos de pequeno tamano estan inscritas: "!Alcancemos nuevos triunfos en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista con una ofensiva general revolucionaria!".
					
					Uno de ellos conlleva la foto del Maximo Dirigente pronunciando el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del 107 (2018) de la Era Juche y tiene en la parte abajo la palabra "Unidad monolitica".
					
					El otro con la frase "Considerando como trampolin para el nuevo desarrollo la victoria historica alcanzada en la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares de la Republica" llama a librar una ofensiva general de todo el pueblo para glorificar el septuagesimo aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC como gran evento revolucionario.
					
					Los papeles enterizos intitulados "Abramos la brecha de activacion en todas las esferas economicas" y "Desarrollo universal de la cultura socialista" subrayan la necesidad de hacer mas fuerte el caracter independiente y autoctono de la economia nacional, mejorar las condiciones de vida del pueblo y desarrollar de manera universal la cultura socialista.
					
					Quedaron impresos tambien el papel enterizo intitulado "Fortalezcamos mas la capacidad de autodefensa nacional" y otros.

articles.title: Editados nuevos afiches en Corea
articles.content:
Editados nuevos afiches en Corea 
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- Fueron editados nuevos afiches para llamar al ejercito y pueblo del pais a la materializacion de las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un. 
					El afiche con las inscripciones de "!Viva el aniversario 70 de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea!" refleja el gran jubilo de los militares y civiles coreanos que celebraran con solemnidad el 70o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC. 
					
					Los otros "!Alcancemos nuevos triunfos en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista con una ofensiva general revolucionaria!", "!Todos a la materializacion de las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo!" y "!Desarrollemos una ofensiva general revolucionaria tomando como trampolin la historica victoria alcanzada en la construccion de las fuerzas armadas nucleares!" llaman a hacer ingentes esfuerzos para llevar a una nueva etapa de desarrollo el poderio estatal de la RPDC frustrando los desafios de las fuerzas hostiles mediante la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo bajo la guia del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					
					"!Abramos la brecha para la activacion de todos los dominios economicos!", "!Cubramos las necesidades de materiales de hierro y acero de la economia nacional!" y "!Renovemos los equipos y procesos productivos de las fabricas de industria ligera para ahorrar la mano de obra y la electricidad!", etc. reflejan la idea de elevar el nivel independiente y autoctono de la economia nacional y mejorar la vida del pueblo.
					
					Tambien saltan a la vista las pancartas que muestran el entusiasmo de los militares y civiles de acelerar la construccion de los objetos importantes y marchar hacia la cima de la potencia cientifico-tecnica y la civilizada.

articles.title: Se abriran escuelas de futbol en varias localidades de Corea
articles.content:
Se abriran escuelas de futbol en varias localidades de Corea
Pyongyang, 31 de enero (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con el director de la Asociacion de Futbol de Corea, Jang Chol Jun, se instauraran las escuelas de futbol en la ciudad de Pyongyang y en todas las provincias (las ciudades subordinadas directamente al centro) con el objetivo de formar muchos futbolistas de reserva que puedan contribuir al desarrollo de tecnicas futbolisticas del pais.
					Los planteles con 2 grados primarios, 3 secundarios basicos y 3 secundarios superiores ensenaran las asignaturas basicas y las teorias y movimientos de futbol.
					
					La ciudad de Pyongyang y todas las provincias (las ciudades subordinadas directamente al centro) seleccionan rigurosamente a los alumnos por edades y se esfuerzan por ofrecer excelentes condiciones y ambiente de ensenanza a las escuelas de futbol.
					
					La inauguracion de las escuelas de futbol esta prevista para el primero de abril.
